text.name: system_description
text.text: Return to Castle Wolfenstein is a military- and occult-themed first-person shooter game in a Second World War setting, originally released in 2001. It is a sequel to Wolfenstein 3D. This port contains the iortcw game engines for the single-player campaign and multiplayer, based on ioquake3 and the GPL source releases of RtCW. Return to Castle Wolfenstein requires non-distributable game data files, which you have to install manually (see pkg-message).

text.name: system_description
text.text: Return to Castle Wolfenstein es un juego de disparos en primera persona con temática militar y ocultista ambientado en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, lanzado originalmente en 2001. Es una secuela de Wolfenstein 3D. Este port contiene los motores de juego iortcw para la campaña de un jugador y multijugador, basados ​​en ioquake3 y las versiones fuente GPL de RtCW.
